name: three-finger-tap-js
description: A small library that attempts to mimic the three finger tap behaviour exhibited when you do a three finder tap on an URL in Safari.

scripts.combine: node-sass src/scss/main.scss | postcss --use autoprefixer | cleancss -o dist/threeFingerTap.min.css
scripts.build:js:dev: npm run lint && npm run js
scripts.build:js:prod: npm run lint && npm run js && npm run minify:js
scripts.build:css:dev: npm run scss && npm run postcss
scripts.build:css:prod: npm run scss && npm run postcss && npm run minify:css
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:js:dev && npm run build:css:dev
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:js:prod && npm run build:css:prod
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
